You've signed up for the Tectonic Lab Plan

It takes a few steps to get started:

1. Install Kubernetes.
2. Launch the Tectonic Console.
3. Launch the Quay Enterprise registry to build and store your container images.

Get Started: https://tectonic.com/docs/lab/quickstart

We want to make sure your lab is up and running with containers. Contact CoreOS Support (https://account.tectonic.com/support) between 8am - 5pm pacific time for questions, debugging, advice and more.

Download your license and manage your account at https://account.tectonic.com

If you didn't request this action, please let us know by responding to this email.

Have a good day!
